item.title: Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPV 6)
item.description: Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) is the most recent version of the Internet Protocol (Ip) IPv6 extends address size to 128 bits

item.title: IP Address
item.description: IP address is 32 bit address IP address are unique IP stands for internet protocol and is basically an address that the packets will be sent to

item.title: Networks Communications Protocols
item.description: A protocol is simply an agreed-on set of rules and procedures for transmitting data between two or more devices [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_networks/open_system_interconnection_7_model_(OSI 7)|OSI 7 Model]]

item.title: Open System Interconnection 7 Model (OSI 7)
item.description: The 7 layers of the open system interconnection (OSI) Model are Layer 1 - Physical Layer 2 - Datalink Layer 3 - Network Layer 4 - Transport Layer 5 - Session Layer 6 - Presentation Layer 7 - Application
